entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:00 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 07:35 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
